<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;Mask = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>.getArgOperand(2))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cast the input vectors to byte vectors.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Idx &amp;= 31; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match the hardware behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>.isLittleEndian())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Idx = 31 - Idx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ExtractedElts&#91;Idx&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that there is no hardware loop related intrinsics in the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BB : L-&gt;getBlocks())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : &#42;BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntrinsicInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::set&#95;loop&#95;iterations ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::loop&#95;decrement)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> ExitingBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  L-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitingBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is an exit edge known to be frequently taken,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we should not transform this loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BB : ExitingBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;TI = BB-&gt;getTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TI) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(TI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t TrueWeight = 0, FalseWeight = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BI-&gt;isConditional() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(&#42;BI, TrueWeight, FalseWeight))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the exit path is more frequent than the loop path,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we return here without further analysis for this loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrueIsExit = !L-&gt;contains(BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (( TrueIsExit &amp;&amp; FalseWeight &lt; TrueWeight) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (!TrueIsExit &amp;&amp; FalseWeight &gt; TrueWeight))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = L-&gt;getHeader()-&gt;getContext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  HWLoopInfo.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hardwareloopinfo/#ac3a4a577c64538aa965b6ce5d81de298">CountType</a> = TM.isPPC64() ?</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The A2 is in-order with a deep pipeline, and concatenation unrolling</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 12;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For most things, modern systems have two execution units (and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out-of-order execution).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns a cost adjustment factor to adjust the cost of vector instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on targets which there is overlap between the vector and scalar units,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// thereby reducing the overall throughput of vector code wrt. scalar code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An invalid instruction cost is returned if the type is an MMA vector type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13">PPCTTIImpl::vectorCostAdjustmentFactor</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the vector type is of an MMA type (v256i1, v512i1), an invalid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction cost is returned. This is to signify to other cost computing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions to return the maximum instruction cost in order to prevent any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opportunities for the optimizer to produce MMA types within the IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ad2093e0d56366af0bbe8387b51f4a4d5">isMMAType</a>(Ty1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a57207993e2fe6ec98912e8072e4600bc">InstructionCost::getInvalid</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ST-&gt;vectorsUseTwoUnits() || !Ty1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT1 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Ty1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If type legalization involves splitting the vector, we don&#39;t want to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// double the cost at every step - only the last step.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LT1.first != 1 || !LT1.second.isVector())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (at least in the sense that there need only be one non-loop-invariant</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register (this is not true for arbitrary shuffles, but is true for the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a513e1873d7e7760f5e0241cc47a9aaca"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a513e1873d7e7760f5e0241cc47a9aaca">PPCTTIImpl::getVectorInstrCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Val,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;This must be a vector type&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> = TLI-&gt;InstructionOpcodeToISD(Opcode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid opcode&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CostFactor = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13">vectorCostAdjustmentFactor</a>(Opcode, Val, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CostFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a6de26b938774385a0a4fb0d0b2a32d48">InstructionCost::getMax</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Val, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &#42;= CostFactor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp; Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7c742b32ebcd73d6dc851afac295b0f2">getScalarType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#aa0fd6bf3d33236279db7b707bba755f4">isDoubleTy</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Double-precision scalars are already located in index #0 (or #1 if LE).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9329e79f62e9ab9b41cfbcafd314bcbd">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Index == (ST-&gt;isLittleEndian() ? 1 : 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7c742b32ebcd73d6dc851afac295b0f2">getScalarType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac6d28a9b11139182134a9618028a0d07">isIntegerTy</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltSize = Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Computing on 1 bit values requires extra mask or compare operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaskCostForOneBitSize = (<a href="#a5bc4ce5f29c2ad64b0ff451e5efb3309">VecMaskCost</a> &amp;&amp; EltSize == 1) ? 1 : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Computing on non const index requires extra mask or compare operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaskCostForIdx = (Index != -1U) ? 0 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasP9Altivec()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// P10 has vxform insert which can handle non const index. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MaskCostForIdx is for masking the index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// P9 has insert for const index. A move-to VSR and a permute/insert.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume vector operation cost for both (cost will be 2x on P9).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasP10Vector())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CostFactor + MaskCostForIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Index != -1U)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2 &#42; CostFactor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9329e79f62e9ab9b41cfbcafd314bcbd">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s an extract.  Maybe we can do a cheap move-from VSR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltSize = Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// P9 has both mfvsrd and mfvsrld for 64 bit integer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EltSize == 64 &amp;&amp; Index != -1U)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EltSize == 32) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MfvsrwzIndex = ST-&gt;isLittleEndian() ? 2 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Index == MfvsrwzIndex)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For other indexs like non const, P9 has vxform extract. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MaskCostForIdx is for masking the index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CostFactor + MaskCostForIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need a vector extract (or mfvsrld).  Assume vector operation cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The cost of the load constant for a vector extract is disregarded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (invariant, easily schedulable).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CostFactor + MaskCostForOneBitSize + MaskCostForIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasDirectMove() &amp;&amp; Index != -1U) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume permute has standard cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume move-to/move-from VSR have 2x standard cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3 + MaskCostForOneBitSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Estimated cost of a load-hit-store delay.  This was obtained</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// experimentally as a minimum needed to prevent unprofitable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vectorization for the paq8p benchmark.  It may need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// raised further if other unprofitable cases remain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHSPenalty = 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LHSPenalty += 7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vector element insert/extract with Altivec is very expensive,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because they require store and reload with the attendant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// processor stall for load-hit-store.  Until VSX is available,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these need to be estimated as very costly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9329e79f62e9ab9b41cfbcafd314bcbd">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHSPenalty + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a9ab346ad59b02578a3fc143c77397761"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a9ab346ad59b02578a3fc143c77397761">PPCTTIImpl::getMemoryOpCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> Alignment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo">TTI::OperandValueInfo</a> OpInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CostFactor = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13">vectorCostAdjustmentFactor</a>(Opcode, Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CostFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a6de26b938774385a0a4fb0d0b2a32d48">InstructionCost::getMax</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, Src,  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) == MVT::Other)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a522a29dd7d0932170a6915e84657218b">BaseT::getMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, Src, Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Legalize the type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Opcode == Instruction::Load || Opcode == Instruction::Store) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid Opcode&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a522a29dd7d0932170a6915e84657218b">BaseT::getMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, Src, Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Handle other cost kinds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a> != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba59b32ea7b6f10564abd40ad90602ca5b">TTI::TCK&#95;RecipThroughput</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &#42;= CostFactor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsAltivecType = ST-&gt;hasAltivec() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       (LT.second == MVT::v16i8 || LT.second == MVT::v8i16 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        LT.second == MVT::v4i32 || LT.second == MVT::v4f32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsVSXType = ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   (LT.second == MVT::v2f64 || LT.second == MVT::v2i64);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VSX has 32b/64b load instructions. Legalization can handle loading of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32b/64b to VSR correctly and cheaply. But BaseT::getMemoryOpCost and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PPCTargetLowering can&#39;t compute the cost appropriately. So here we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explicitly check this case. There are also corresponding store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemBits = Src-&gt;getPrimitiveSizeInBits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcBytes = LT.second.getStoreSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp; IsAltivecType) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MemBits == 64 || (ST-&gt;hasP8Vector() &amp;&amp; MemBits == 32))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use lfiwax/xxspltw</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> AlignBytes = Alignment ? &#42;Alignment : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Load &amp;&amp; MemBits == 32 &amp;&amp; AlignBytes &lt; SrcBytes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Aligned loads and stores are easy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SrcBytes || !Alignment || &#42;Alignment &gt;= SrcBytes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we can use the permutation-based load sequence, then this is also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relatively cheap (not counting loop-invariant instructions): one load plus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one permute (the last load in a series has extra cost, but we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// neglecting that here). Note that on the P7, we could do unaligned loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for Altivec types using the VSX instructions, but that&#39;s more expensive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than using the permutation-based load sequence. On the P8, that&#39;s no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// longer true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Load &amp;&amp; (!ST-&gt;hasP8Vector() &amp;&amp; IsAltivecType) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;Alignment &gt;= LT.second.getScalarType().getStoreSize())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> + LT.first; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the cost of the permutations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VSX, we can do unaligned loads and stores on Altivec/VSX types. On the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// P7, unaligned vector loads are more expensive than the permutation-based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load sequence, so that might be used instead, but regardless, the net cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is about the same (not counting loop-invariant instructions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsVSXType || (ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp; IsAltivecType))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Newer PPC supports unaligned memory access.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TLI-&gt;allowsMisalignedMemoryAccesses(LT.second, 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PPC in general does not support unaligned loads and stores. They&#39;ll need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be decomposed based on the alignment factor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the cost of each scalar load or store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += LT.first &#42; ((SrcBytes / Alignment-&gt;value()) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a vector type, there is also scalarization overhead (only for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stores, loads are expanded using the vector-load + permutation sequence,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is much less expensive).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp; Opcode == Instruction::Store)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Src)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp/#a2f1d58ac35de4475017aca6c5bda6d44">getNumElements</a>(); i &lt; e;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">         ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a513e1873d7e7760f5e0241cc47a9aaca">getVectorInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ExtractElement, Src, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, i,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PPC, for both Altivec/VSX, support cheap arbitrary permutations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (at least in the sense that there need only be one non-loop-invariant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction). For each result vector, we need one shuffle per incoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector (except that the first shuffle can take two incoming vectors</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Opcode == Instruction::Load || Opcode == Instruction::Store) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid Opcode&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SrcVTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SrcVTy &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected a vector type for VP memory operations&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#ad4522ba73eb89ae20c7ca46349303f3e">hasActiveVectorLength</a>(Opcode, Src, Alignment)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(SrcVTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CostFactor =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13">vectorCostAdjustmentFactor</a>(Opcode, Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CostFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a6de26b938774385a0a4fb0d0b2a32d48">InstructionCost::getMax</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = LT.first &#42; CostFactor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.isValid() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected valid cost&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On P9 but not on P10, if the op is misaligned then it will cause a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pipeline flush. Otherwise the VSX masked memops cost the same as unmasked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> DesiredAlignment(16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Alignment &gt;= DesiredAlignment || ST-&gt;getCPUDirective() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34a0a03bfd83c00f4d1edab975b7bfe7f36">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR9</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since alignment may be under estimated, we try to compute the probability</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the actual address is aligned to the desired boundary. For example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an 8-byte aligned load is assumed to be actually 16-byte aligned half the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// time, while a 4-byte aligned load has a 25% chance of being 16-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AlignmentProb = ((float)Alignment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>()) / DesiredAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MisalignmentProb = 1 - AlignmentProb;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MisalignmentProb &#42; P9PipelineFlushEstimate) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (AlignmentProb &#42; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.getValue());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Usually we should not get to this point, but the following is an attempt to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// model the cost of legalization. Currently we can only lower intrinsics with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// evl but no mask, on Power 9/10. Otherwise, we must scalarize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a172b3291a66a7313017f3d68422da9cd">getMaskedMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, Src, Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
